Detailed Description

WordPress config file.

Contains default values for WordPress.

The name of the database for WordPress.

MySQL database username. MySQL database password. MySQL hostname. Database charset. Database collate type. Leave blank. Authentication unique keys. Automatically generated. You can change them if you want.

Link:
https://api.wordpress.org/secret-key/1.1/ WordPress.org secret-key service
Since:
WordPress 2.6.0 WordPress localized language, defaults to English. WordPress absolute path to the Wordpress directory. Wordpress debug mode.
